title: Karachi to Ashgabat via Afghanistan
path: Karachi → Chaman Border (Pakistan/Afghanistan) → Torghundi Border (Afghanistan/Turkmenistan) → Ashgabat (Turkmenistan).

title: Karachi to Kabul via Chaman
path: Karachi → Chaman Border (Pakistan/Afghanistan) → Kabul (Afghanistan).

title: Karachi to Kabul via Torkham
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham Border (Pakistan/Afghanistan) → Kabul (Afghanistan).

title: Karachi to Dushanbe via Chaman
path: Karachi → Chaman Border → Afghanistan → Dushanbe (Tajikistan).

title: Karachi to Dushanbe via Torkham
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham Border → Afghanistan → Dushanbe (Tajikistan).

title: Karachi to Uzbekistan via Hairatan
path: Karachi → Chaman Border → Afghanistan → Hairatan Border → Uzbekistan.

title: Karachi to Uzbekistan via Torkham

title: Karachi to Almaty via Uzbekistan

title: Karachi to Almaty via Torkham
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham → Hairatan → Tashkent → Almaty.

title: Karachi to Tashkent via Afghanistan
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham → Kabul → Mazar-e-Sharif → Hairatan → Termez → Tashkent.

title: Karachi to Almaty via Shymkent
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham → Hairatan → Termez → Shymkent → Almaty.

title: Karachi to Tashkent via Iran
path: Karachi → Gwadar → Bandar Abbas → Mashhad → Sarakhs → Mary → Bukhara → Tashkent.

title: Karachi to Almaty via Caspian Sea
path: Karachi → Gwadar → Bandar Abbas → Tehran → Bandar Anzali → Caspian Sea → Aktau → Almaty.

title: Karachi to Dushanbe via Sher Khan Bandar
path: Karachi → Peshawar → Torkham → Kabul → Kunduz → Sher Khan Bandar → Dushanbe.

title: Karachi to Bishkek via China
path: Karachi → Gilgit → Khunjerab Pass → Kashgar → Irkeshtam Pass → Osh → Bishkek.

title: Jebel Ali to Almaty via Iran
path: Jebel Ali → Bandar Abbas → Tehran → Sarakhs → Ashgabat → Aktau → Almaty.

title: Jebel Ali to Tashkent via Iran
path: Jebel Ali → Bandar Abbas → Mashhad → Sarakhs → Mary → Bukhara → Tashkent.

title: Poti Port to Almaty

title: Poti Port to Tashkent

title: Batumi to Ashgabat
